definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Mr White has converted to Buddhism.
Grotto art is for the people at that time Xinfo services.
sentences.chinese: 石窟藝術是爲當時信佛的人們服務的。

sentences.english: How do you know I believe in Buddhism?
You know, I believe in Buddhism.
White people look at you strangely if you tell them you are Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 當你告訴人你信佛教，白人很奇怪地眼神看着你。

sentences.english: Way back before, Buddhism wasn’t an alien religion to me.
sentences.chinese: 在信佛之前，佛教對我來說並不陌生。

sentences.english: He married Princess Wencheng of the Tang Dynasty who believed in Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 他迎娶了唐朝信佛的文成公主。

sentences.english: He seems to believe Buddhism, but never have faith in it.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎信佛，但從不曾誠篤於佛。

sentences.english: My families believe in Buddhism. So I feel guilty of killing innocent flies.
sentences.chinese: 我們家人信佛，所以我殺果蠅心裏很內疚。

sentences.english: Since then, people rushed to convert to expand the ethos, buddhist apart.
sentences.chinese: 此後，人們爭相皈依，信佛的風氣便擴大開來。

sentences.english: Some of his friends were Buddhists , and told him not to kill any more goats.
sentences.chinese: 他有些信佛的朋友，他們告誡薛慶觀不要再殺羊了。

sentences.english: If will have next life, I believe in Buddhism say.
sentences.chinese: 洳果絠來玍，莪葙信佛說啲。

sentences.english: According to some Buddhists, those who have seen the buddha's Halo will go to heaven and become immortal.
sentences.chinese: 信佛的人說，看道這種景色的人就可以昇天成佛。

sentences.english: This young man has converted to Buddhism recently.
sentences.chinese: 這個年輕人最近改信佛教了。

sentences.english: Buddhists never force people into their belief.
sentences.chinese: 佛教徒從不強迫別人信佛。

definition: religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
to believe firmly/devout in one's faith
to abstain from eating meat/to be a vegetarian
to burn incense and worship Buddha
to recite or chant Buddhist scripture
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
to pray to Buddha/to chant the names of Buddha
